channel.title: Jad Attacks me when I log on
channel.description:
Could anyone tell me what's wrong?
As soon as I log on, jad hits me, and he keeps attacking me.. should I simply re-start server? or what's wrong??
Also looking for a good coder, please add my msn - leroux_b@hotmail.com

item.title: Jad Attacks me when I log on
item.dc:creator: @Javac_Batch Javac Batch
item.description:
@Javac_Batch wrote:

Bane50, I told you to go to RuneL0cus and click the NPC list. Find Jad’s ID then search your autospawn.CFG and remove Jad’s ID from there. Save, Compile, Run, fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: Jad Attacks me when I log on

item.title: Jad Attacks me when I log on
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Dude just kill jad, or you need find an new place where you can set him, and i can help you with code what ever you wants but i can only code small thinks like “shops” “talking npc” “monster” “npc” “commands” “teleports”

Read full topic

item.title: Jad Attacks me when I log on
item.dc:creator: @Javac_Batch Javac Batch
item.description:
@Javac_Batch wrote:

[quote=“SpartacusLegend, post:7, topic:257963”][quote author=Javac Batch link=topic=340575.msg2638332#msg2638332 date=1232677094]

Maybe he doesn’t like you?

Why bother looking through the help section if your not going to at least attempt to help somebody.
[/quote]

Lol, chill it’s just a joke.[/quote]
There is a general forum at MITB for jokes. This is a “help” section, so don’t bother wasting yours or anyone elses time if you won’t help.

Read full topic

item.title: Jad Attacks me when I log on
item.dc:creator: @Javac_Batch Javac Batch
item.description:
@Javac_Batch wrote:

Autospawn.CFG. Check Jad’s ID then remove it. Your jad from the fight pits won’t be removed because it should be in Client.Java.

Read full topic
